author: andschwa
body:
<!--
Before submitting this pull request, please first:

- [ ] State that it "Resolves #xyz".
- [ ] Ensure your code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).
- [ ] Assign the PR to the appropriate subsystem [maintainer](https://aka.ms/psowners).
- [ ] Check that your commits follow our [contributing guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md)
-->

Resolves #1116.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
- [x] Add tag (carefully)
- [ ] Update `source-depot` branch
- [ ] Find way to avoid `dos2unix`ing ASCII with CRLF files (later)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I need to update the `source-depot` branch but from a commit that exists on a VM I can't remote to right now.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @andschwa please, update the `source-depot` branch and we can start work on the reviewing the diff.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Thanks for reminding me @vors. Pushed...but there are some odd things in the diff.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Forget about the odd things. I hadn't pulled master so I didn't have the SD changes on the other side :P

title: Merge SD changeset 715912
